item.description:
Reposting from Facebook:  http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=193317824067691

This month Liberty Drinks travels to Somerville to engage in political hijinks. Come and celebrate election season with our favorite political drinking games! We'll be playing "Name that federal agency", "Who got the bailout?" and the timeless "Who said it? Bush or Obama". Winners will receive $20 of Federal Reserve Notes in PDF file format*, that you can take home and print to create your own economic stimulus!

Just doin' our  part for freedom ya'll.

* To download and print a PDF file, you will need to have the Adobe Acrobat Reader software installed. You can download the latest version of Adobe Acrobat Reader FREE from Adobe's Web site.

Text Liberty to 64274 to sign up for our SMS reminder service!

As always, see the hostess if you have any problem finding us, call or text me (Andreas) at 617-398-7402.
item.how_to_find_us: See the hostess if you have any problem finding us; or call/text Andreas at 617-398-7402.

group.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group

item.name: Liberty Drinks Boston: all your votes are belong to us drinkfest!
